price: Le concedí poder en la Tierra y le facilité los medios [para que siguiera el camino del bien].
arabic: إِنَّا مَكَّنَّا لَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ سَبَبٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: innā makkannā lahu fī al-arḍi waātaynāhu min kulli shayin sababan
